sn37.34:1.1: “Mendicants, a female noble disciple who grows in five ways grows nobly, taking on what is essential and excellent in this life.
sn37.34:1.3: She grows in faith, ethics, learning, generosity, and wisdom.
sn37.34:1.4: A female noble disciple who grows in these five ways grows nobly, taking on what is essential and excellent in this life.
sn37.34:2.1: When she grows in faith and ethics,
sn37.34:2.2: wisdom, and both generosity and learning—
sn37.34:2.3: a virtuous laywoman such as she
sn37.34:2.4: takes on what is essential for herself in this life.”
sn37.34:3.5: The Linked Discourses on females are complete.
